Title: Conventions of Space and Time
Plot: The study group goes to the annual Inspector Spacetime Convention; Annie enjoys the luxuries of the hotel; Jeff spends time with an Inspector Spacetime fan (Tricia Helfer) in the bar.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Matt Lucas, Tricia Helfer, Chris Tallman, JR Reed, Mark Ryan, Brad Stevens, Summer Stevens, Anthony Liebetrau, Luke Perry, Jennie Garth
